page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN GREENLOANING
page.content: Farming is the main industry in Greenloaning. There are several privately owned farms but much of the land is owned and farmed by a large concern. The main crops grown in the area are potatoes,turnips,peas,barley, hay and oil seed rape. The growing of oil seed rape is relatively new and provides a lovely splash of colour, with the bright yellow flowers. The growing of peas in a big way, is also a new crop for this area. There are no dairy farms in the area now,the cattle are mainly beef cattle; Aberdeen Angus,Hereford & Charollais. The sheep are mainly Cross Suffolk, although one shepherd has a few Jacob sheep. There is a fairly large pig farm at Balhaldie . Poultry & game are plentiful too,hens,ducks,turkeys, grouse and pheasant. Free range eggs are on sale at most of the farms.
